Headline: #88 Higgins Temporary Westbound Reroute near Talcott/Oriole
ShortDescription: Westbound #88 Higgins buses are temporarily rerouted via Talcott, Oriole and Devon: due to, street blockage near Talcott/Oriole.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Westbound #88 Higgins buses are temporarily rerouted via Talcott, Oriole, Devon and over regular route , due to street blockage near Talcott/Oriole.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
